name: php.net (beta site - responsive css)
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
this style applies the site php.net correctly if you are using the new beta design. and there only if the browser inner-width is smaller then 976 pixels. in this case it reduces some elements to get a better view on the current article. in detail the header, menu, uvTab ( feedback & ideas ) & footer will be shrinked to a minimum. if you hover any of these shrinked elements they will appear. example page used in screenshots.
additional_info: tested browsers : google chrome, mozilla firefox todo : check in opera change log : 2018-01-09 - just updated the licence to "no redistribution" 2013-10-12 - style published on userstyles.org, screenshots (beta design & none beta - taken in chrome)
